duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct financial analysis of development opportunities, including the creation of detailed pro-forma and financial models.
Gather, compile, investigate, and analyze market data to identify potential development opportunities, and prepare investment committee memos, detailed reports, and market summaries.

Identify, investigate, and refer potential acquisitions and other real estate transactions to appropriate leaders, and assist in preparing financial, market, and other documents for new business pitches and RFPs.

Organize, lead, and/or participate in the due diligence on properties under contract, and develop documentation and recommendations on key findings that may affect the return and financial performance of the proposed deal.

Conduct market research through internal and external sources, engage with local junior brokers, and participate in industry organizations to build relationships with local real estate professionals and other key stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
